hotels.title: City Escape in Heart of Helsinki Overlooking Hesperia Park
hotels.description: Mirroring the style and functionality of the city in which it resides, enjoy a peaceful city escape to Crowne Plaza Helsinki - Hesperia, an IHG Hotel. With the city's electrifying sights only a short stroll away, neoclassical history, intriguing culture and creative designs are at your fingertips. Feast on a bevy of Finnish flavours, sustainably foraged and farmed dishes, at the cosy Hesperia Restaurant And Bar, or enjoy a drink at the lobby bar and watch the world go by.

hotels.title: Hedonistic Helsinki Haven with Scandinavian-Style Bistro
